entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 02:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero except minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High zero except minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
